```{r, results='hide', warning=FALSE, message = FALSE}
library(dplyr)
library(readxl)
library(lubridate)

library(ggplot2)
library(plotly)
library(sf)
library(leaflet)
```

```{r}
nta_health = read_excel("../../data/raw_data/nta-metadata.xlsx", sheet = 3)
neighborhoods <- st_read("../../data/raw_data/nynta2010_25a/nynta2010.shp") %>% st_transform(4326)

nta_health = nta_health %>% select(c("NTA_Name", "NTA_Code", "TotalPop", "Hispanic", "WhiteNonHisp", "BlackNonHisp",
                        "AsianPI", "OtherRace", "Poverty", "PrematureMortality",
                        "PretermBirths", "SMM", "HIV",
                        "HepB", "HepC", "TB"))%>%
  left_join(neighborhoods, by = c("NTA_Code" = "NTACode"))%>%
  st_as_sf()

```

Sanity check. Empty spaces seem to be urban parks.
```{r}
ggplot(nta_health)+
  geom_sf(mapping= aes(fill = TotalPop))


ggplot(nta_health)+geom_sf(mapping=aes(fill = HIV))

```
